name: Infusionsoft Exit Optin
author: Novak Solutions

sections.description:
The Exit Optin plugin integrates WordPress with your Infusionsoft app. Select a web form, and when your visitor’s mouse leaves your website the plugin will pop-up the web form optin form in a non-obtrusive way.

Want to do even more with Infusionsoft? Novak Solutions has expert developers and ready-to-go tools to make your life easier. Visit Novak Solutions now!
sections.faq:
Do I need an Infusionsoft account?

Yes, you will need to provide your Infusionsoft API key.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Code cleanup and commenting.
  • Added link to additional WordPress plugins by Novak Solutions.
  • Added link to rate plugin at WordPress.org.

1.0.3

  • Tested up to 3.8.1
  • Bug fix: Don’t throw an error if user switches Infusionsoft apps
  • Bug fix: Don’t throw an error if the selected web form is deleted

1.0.2

  • Removed reference to non-existant JS file

1.0.1

  • Fix to allow multi-line web form names

1.0.0

  • First release on WordPress.org
